Suspected militants shoot and kill a police officer outside a Cairo museum. 
Sinai Province of IS launched major attacks against the army, killing approximately 70 soldiers and civilians. The government used F-16s in the region to stop the attacks, approximately 38 militants were killed. 
Army launches an attack against the IS affiliated militants in the Sinai peninsula after they attacks military bases in the region.
unknown gunmen on a motorcycle shoots and kills a police officer.
IS claims car bombing attack on Italian consulate that kills 1. 
Pro-Morsi protesters hold small marches in Cairo and Alexandria on Eid-al-fatr. Six people are killed during clashes with police after protesters attack police.
Pro-Morsi protesters hold small marches in Cairo and Alexandria on Eid-al-fatr. Six people are killed during clashes with police after protesters attack police.
Families of the passengers and victims of a boat crash in the Nile block the main road in the Warraq district. Security forces disperse the protest, no causalities. 
In a raid against two suspected jihadist bombers of the Italian consulate, two people are killed. 
Police officer is killed guarding Nigerian consulate.
Policeman shot and killed by unknown gunmen during a transport of prisoners.
Thousands of public workers organize and protest new law seeking to reform civil service.
IS kill Croatian prisoner it accused of colluding with the army. 
Military plane crashes in the southwest part of Egypt near the border with Libya while on a counter terrorism mission. Four soldiers were killed.
Unknown militants detonate a car bomb that wounds six police officers. 
Unknown militants detonate a roadside bomb targeting a police bus carrying conscript to Beheira, killing three. 
Egypt conducts an air strike against  terrorists but kills an envoy of tourists from Cairo, many of whom were from foreign nationals.  
Unknown militants detonate a bomb wounding two civilians. 
Army targets and kills 10 militants near the Bahariya Oasis.
Police report that they killed 9 terrorists in Cairo that were planning an attack to coincide with Eid al-Adha. 
Militants target and kill a pro-army tribal leader from the Sinai region outside his Cairo home.
Smugglers kill a police officer after he attempts to foil their smuggling. 
Unknown militants place and detonate three homemade bombs throughout Alexandria, no fatalities reported. 
Unknown militants place a roadside bomb that detonated as the victims passed by on the road. 
IS militants attack a checkpoint kidnapping three pro-government tribal fighters and wounding two soldiers. 
IS planted a bomb at a Cairo intersection four people were wounded and no fatalities reported. 
Three police officers were killed when their convoy passed over a road side bomb.
Gunmen shot the islamist candidate in the Egyptian parliamentary elections.
Soldiers kill three militants hiding out in the Ismailiya province.
IS downs a Russian airliner killing all 224 passenger and crew on board. 
IS suicide bomber attacks a police club killing three officers and wounding 10 others.
Police kill Ashraf Ali Hassanein Gharabli in a gunfight in Cairo.
Gunmen open fire on a church near the Giza pyramids no fatalities reported.
Egyptian police targeting smugglers on the border with Israel kill 15 Sudanese migrants as they attempt to cross the border.
IS suicide car bomber kills seven at a resort in El-Arish.
Hundreds protest the death of a man while in police custody. Police use gunfire to disperse protest, one wounded. 
IS attack and kill four police officers near Giza. 
Unknown suspects target a Cairo night club with a fire bomb killing 16 people trapped inside. 
Unknown gunmen shoot a university dean outside his home. Motive is unclear.
Unknown militants detonate a bomb in Giza killing three including a senior judge and wounding 11. 
Police open fire on a mentally unstable man attempting to cross the border. Palestinian officials attempt to signal to hold their fire.
Shell fired by IS militants kills an entire family in their home.
